entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow with rain this evening and with freezing rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
